detaileddescription.para: Returns value in LTD history at time t

memberdef.argsstring: (double t1, double t2, std::deque< histentry_extended >::iterator *start, std::deque< histentry_extended >::iterator *finish) override
memberdef.name: get_LTP_history

detaileddescription.para: Sets pointer start (finish) to the first (last) entry in LTP_history whose time argument is between t1 and t2

memberdef.argsstring: (const double t_ltd_ms, double u_bar_minus, double u_bar_bar)
memberdef.name: write_LTD_history

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new entry in the LTD history and deletes old entries that are not needed any more.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double t_ltp_ms, double u, double u_bar_plus)
memberdef.name: write_LTP_history

detaileddescription.para: Creates a new entry in the LTP history and delets old entries that are not needed any more.

memberdef.argsstring: (Time const &t_sp, double u, double u_bar_plus, double u_bar_minus, double u_bar_bar)
memberdef.name: write_clopath_history

detaileddescription.para: Writes and reads the delayed_u_bar_[plus/minus] buffers and calls write_LTD_history and write_LTP_history if the corresponding Heaviside functions yield 1.
